content.meta_description: {{FROM}} to {{TO}} conversion in {{ProductName}} with a few lines of code. Convert over 160 file formats using the GroupDocs document conversion API for {{ProductName}}
content.h2: {{FROM}} to {{TO}} conversion with a few lines of {{ProductName}} code

about.title: About {{ProductFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) is an advanced file format conversion API for converting between popular image and document formats such as Microsoft Office, OpenDocument, PDF, HTML, email, CAD. and much more with just a few lines of code. The native API automatically detects the formats of the original documents and offers many options for customizing the converted documents. Along with the function of extracting information from a document, it also supports caching of the conversion results to the local disk by default. However, any type of cache storage can be supported by implementing the appropriate interfaces - Amazon S3, Dropbox, Google Drive, Windows Azure, Reddis, or any others.

overview.description1: Convert your {{FROM}} files to {{TO}} in {{ProductName}}. It only takes a couple of lines of {{ProgLang}} code on any platform of your choice, such as Windows, Linux, macOS.
overview.description2: You can try converting {{FROM}} to {{TO}} for free and evaluate the quality of the conversion results. Along with simple file conversion scripts, you can try more sophisticated options for loading the {{FROM}} source file and storing the {{TO}} output.
overview.load_options_desc: For example, for the source {{FROM}} file you may use the following load options:
overview.load_options_item_1: automatic detection of the file format
overview.load_options_item_2: specify a password for protected files (if the file format supports it)
overview.load_options_item_3: replace missing fonts to preserve the appearance of the document
overview.convert_options_desc: There are also advanced convert options for the {{TO}} file:
overview.convert_options_item_1: convert a specific page of a document or a range of pages
overview.convert_options_item_2: add a watermark to the converted {{TO}}
overview.summary: Once the conversion is complete, you can save the {{TO}} file to your local file path or to any third party storage such as FTP, Amazon S3, Google Drive, Dropbox etc. Please note - to convert {{FROM}} to {{TO}}, you do not need to install any additional software, such as MS Office, Open Office, Adobe Acrobat Reader etc.

content_left.description: [{{ProductFullName}}]({{ProductUrl}}) allows developers to easily convert {{FROM}} file to {{TO}} with a few lines of code.
content_left.step_1: Create a new instance of the Converter class and upload the file {{FROM}} with the full path
content_left.step_2: Set ConvertOptions for document type to {{TO}}
content_left.step_3: Call the convert() method and pass the document name (full path) and format ({{TO}}) as a parameter

content_right.description: Basic conversion with {{ProductFullName}} API can be done with just a few lines of code. Our APIs are supported on all major platforms and operating systems. Before executing the code below, make sure you have the following prerequisites installed on your system.
content_right.step_1: Operating systems: Microsoft Windows, Linux, MacOS
